title: Emergency Happened and Placed In LPQ
body:
Hey, so I had a match with a few of my friends, and I had an emergency happen (and I notified everyone) on how the apartment complex I live in was having the fire alarm go off as the neighbor next door had their apartment on fire. I was placed in lower priority queue for 5 games because of this. I'm confused, do we have a 'No Emergency Policy?'

Note: I was forced to evacuate for safety reasons, and this was a normal blind pick match.
